Mashatu in southern Africa has been transformed into a lush paradise. The animals live in abundance. All the families have offspring and the parents concentrate on raising and feeding their young. Aging in the Wild features species that illustrate all spheres of aging: longevity, reproductive health, social status and wisdom. In a few places on this planet, volcanic hot springs are within reach of divers. They are also an important... Film-Details anzeigen 41 Amazon Alive 1 - Green Hell or Paradise? Christian Baumeister Deutschland 2010 45 Min. The Amazon rainforest is a wonder in species diversity and a place of constant challenge for all its inhabitants. Biologists undertake costly expeditions to explore the Amazon's wildlife and fight to secure its survival. Rangers patrol the forest by...
